description: The Yuzuki family consists of four brothers: Hayato, Mikoto, Minato, and Gakuto. The eldest son, Hayato, happily lives every day to the fullest. There are tears, laughter and excitement at home, at school, and in the neighborhood!
hashtag: #柚アニ #柚木さんちの四兄弟
synonyms: สี่พี่น้องยุซึกิ ครอบครัวนี้มีแต่รัก

tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Teacher
tags.description: Protagonist is an educator, usually in a school setting.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Shogi
tags.description: Centers around the game of shogi.

node.description:
Flumpool is a Japanese rock band of four from Osaka. The name is a compound word of f from the English word four, since there are 4 members, along with the word meaning mass, lump, and the word pool. Flumpool falls under the label of A-Sketch.

Yamamura has been writing the lyrics for almost all of their songs and Sakai has been doing the composing.

Members:
• Ryuta Yamamura (山村 隆太) - vocals, guitar
• Kazuki Sakai (阪井 一生) - guitar
• Genki Amakawa (尼川 元気) - bass
• Seiji Ogura (小倉 誠司) - drums

(Source: MAL)

**[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQY7gFOuu0hF2v56CjfOXbA) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kuboaoi_desu) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kuboaoi_official) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@kuboaoi_music) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/6tQv9pBC2QYU5InvkNoN0k?si=i879Jv6LRwWj6_gGAOXJJQ)**

**Aoi Kubo** is a Japanese vocalist and lyricist who began her music career at the age of 15 in August 2020.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/151217/)._
__Tomoki Nagasaka__ is a Japanese editor who works for post production studio Jay Film.
Freelance animator, formerly affiliated with OLM Asia.
Animator affiliated with OLM Asia since 2018.
